name: Small World DEFENDER (adhochero)
description:
You are the SMALL WORLD DEFENDER!
In this action packed VR game you must protect this tiny planet from an alien invasion set on destroying the planet. 
What do they want? the natural resources? is it in the way of a new galactic highway?
It doesn't matter!
You must jump, climb, and shoot your way to victory and save this world from utter annihilation.

made by solo dev adhocHero aka 04 (discord 04#7042).
